additionalRemarks._instruction: Enter any additional remarks concerning this recording.

channel._instruction: Enter all channels used for this recording.

dataLocation._instruction: Add the location of the file or file bundle in which the recorded data is stored.

internalIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this recording that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this recording.

name._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this recording.

previousRecording._instruction: If this recording is part of a sequence of recordings (e.g., multiple repetitions or sweeps), add the recording preceding this recording.

recordedWith._instruction: Add the device used to generate this recording.

samplingFrequency._instruction: Enter the sampling frequency of this recording.
